column2: Poll: Who Lost the (Trump World) Week ?!?!?
column5: As I am travelling this long holiday weekend I do not have my usual compendium diary of news clippings and humor. Thus the perfect time to host a Trump World poll …. normally I exclude him as otherwise this labor-of-love (not only to select but also condense and format) becomes an exercise in futility just to create a walk-over poll. Now’s the time. I am setting this to post on Thursday so it is eminently possible there is a late-breaking candidate in loser-ville …. just write ‘em in. A tune to ponder with:
